headline: 3 Industrials Stocks We Steer Clear Of
summary: Even if they go mostly unnoticed, industrial businesses are the backbone of our country. Their momentum is also rising as lower interest rates have incentivized higher capital spending. As a result, the industry has posted a 20.5% gain over the past six months, beating the S&P 500 by 5.2 percentage points.
